allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
2026-01-16 0300 SACRED BASELINE: Full UI standardization - buttons, layout, borders, colors, all platforms

- Hero/Welcome section: padding reduced, content expanded
- Platform tags removed from all cards
- Blue border \(#0066CC\) added to entire app on all 5 pages
- Sidebar offset \(2px\) for border visibility
- Developer page button colors: Terminal, GitHub, Python, Explorer, Notepad++, Zoom
- Logo padding reduced by 50%

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
2026-01-16 SACRED BASELINE v3: New branding - neuron logo, brain icons, glowing buttons, chat backgrounds

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
